name: Dongle
description: Dongle(동글) is a rounded sans-serif typeface for display. It is a modular Hangeul with the de-square frame, creating a playful and rhythmic movement. The name, Dongle(동글) comes from a Korean onomatopoeia, meaning 'rounded or curved shape(with adorable impression)’. To contribute to the project, visit https://github.com/yangheeryu/Dongle
author: Yanghee Ryu
